Package muno.game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Behaviour
    Establishes action parameters.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractGameScreen  
    AbstractScreen
    Created by mlund on 14/06/17.
    ActionCard
    Class that represents an action card.
    Card
    Class that represents a MUNO card.
    CardFactory
    Creator of the cards.
    ColorableBehaviour
    Behaviour to color cards.
    Dealer
    Class that represents the dealer of the game that controls the flow of the cards
    DiscardPile
    Class that represents the discard pile.
    DrawNBehaviour
    Behaviour that draws a specific number of cards
    DrawPile
    Class that represents the draw pile of the UNO game.
    EndScreen
    Screen that is shown when the game ends (gameState is false).
    Leaderboard
    Leaderboard of the game: contains the scores of the players.
    MenuScreen
    Screen that shows the menu.
    MirrorBehaviour
    Behaviour of the Mirror Cards
    MultiGameScreen
    Screen for multiplayer mode.
    MyGame  
    NumberedCard
    Class that represent a numbered card that has no special behaviour.
    Player
    Class that represents a player and its behavior.
    PlayerIA
    Class that represents a PC player.
    ReverseBehaviour
    Behaviour to reverse the flow of the game
    SingleGameScreen
    Screen for single player mode
    SkipBehaviour
    Behaviour to skip the game.
    UNOGame
    Class that controls the flow of the game
    Updater
    Updates the screen.
